channel.title: [317] Project Rainbow [Delta]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iswmv.png[/img][/center] [b]What are we?[/b] [i]- We are the last standing Delta based server on the toplists with a serious focus on one thing; customs.[/i] [b]Where we started:[/b] [i]- We began our journey in the world of RSPS's in January of 2011. Originally created by Whac/Whackatre in October of 2010.[/i] [b]Why are you creating this topic today?[/b] [i]- We wish to share our development with the rest of the community. At the moment, we are currently debating whether to switch sources from Delta, which as most of you know, is half-assed and outdated. We attempted to switch sources for the first time a month ago, choosing I Roll Deep's RuneFocus but: [quote="Whac, post:203, topic:607"]I couldn't get it online. I'm serious; I've spoken to I Roll Deep and he claims that he actually externally connected to the server. I've debugged for hours and even shutdown Rainbow for a bit to host it on port 43594. Yeah, it didn't work. There's some weird problem with that. You may look at our GitHub if you like. The .zip download is one click. http://github.com/whackatre[/quote] [b]What are your current plans?[/b] [i]Unfortunately, Whackatre has left the development team to focus on his studies as he is now a junior in high school. I will be taking over the development project. The server is in an unstable state and I strongly wish for it to continue. As I am still a beginner at Java, I do not know what to do with the server. Whackatre has suggested that we try a new source again, but I do not know if it will work or not. If we get the RuneSource source to work, that would also be awesome. If all else fails, we could stick with our current source. Whackatre and Blackstar have worked hours to package the source and reduce the size of the Client class. We hope to remain a semi-successful server.[/i] [b]Media:[/b] [b]Chemistry -[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zzl8ISd9P2o[/youtube] [b]Custom NPCs -[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sO2NT.png[/img] [b]Random PvP Drops -[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fdQzc.png[/img] [b]Additional Changes -[/b] Pyramid of Zen - A custom safe PvP area Skeletons - Get points for killing Skeletons! Perfect custom made ::afk system (unique and not gay like the rest) Unnull system (owners can load players' backup files) Token shop (2 bil tax bags = 2 billion coins) Rainbow Points system for bosses XHP (unlimited hp for all, owners can turn it on, players can turn it off for themselves) ::save and ::backup to ensure that you are never nulled Working restart via command, playersaves work Perfect IPlogs with proper date, very useful Trade logs, yell logs, PM logs working perfectly Unsafe Pk - The only place where you lose stuff PvP Drops system (custom made) PvP point shops View bans, ipbans, banlogs, iplogs via command! Master password system, works PERFECT Custom yell colors (eg, purple, dark green, gray) Toggleyell so regular players cannot yell Impersonate (fake yells for any name, via the getYellTitle method) PCbans (stores file on pc) Command listener, sees what every player types! Debug system (sendquest id's, technical stuff, etc) Forcedialog (npc dialog pops up, custom message!) Forcetalk (they say something you input) Special yell that only staff members can see Owners can open players websites Rep ++ and Rep -- system Claws spec works PKban system PERFECT Tempban system PERFECT Mute and IP mute system PERFECT Jail and IP jail system PERFECT PRC system, owners can private tele players, even staffs cannot interrupt them! Only players on a rights list can ban, mute, promote, demote, restart, etc Swap system (swap coords with a player) Get item name via id! Working energy replenish Autologin (we like player count) Random chat FX, but you can change it too! Mac address banning system Shaded chat effects Vote Rewards/Vote Point Shop [b]Current Team:[/b] - Null Amount - Blackstar - Fails - [b]Application Format:[/b]
Name: Previous experience and works: MSN: Timezone: Time available to allocate per day towards the server:
If you have any questions, feel free to Private Message me on here or post below!

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @iz_help_iz iz help iz
item.description:
@iz_help_iz wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:25, topic:454713”]@iz help iz, what part of “I don’t give out my Skype to random strangers” do you not understand? I suggest you create an MSN (which takes a total of 4 minutes, maybe less) and chat with him there, although he does have a spot for Skype in the application. Alright, moving on. I don’t even understand your application.

Name:lucas
Previous experience and works: 6 years
Skype/MSN: skype: lucas.havill2
Timezone:new zealnad
Time available to allocate per day towards the server: like 6-7 hours

First of all, when it asks for previous experience and works, you simply tell him how long you’ve been working with Java, and show him your past work. Pretty simple, correct? Second of all, I didn’t know ‘New Zealand’ was a time-zone. Not to mention, you misspelled it.

On point. This is the only Delta that makes customs look good (That’s my opinion). I logged on awhile back to see what it’s like, and the whole server seems to be based off customs, such as the areas, npc’s, etc. With all of this being said, I wish you the best of luck, I hope you find who you’re looking for to continue the legacy of Project-Rainbow.[/quote]

lol?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

@iz help iz, what part of “I don’t give out my Skype to random strangers” do you not understand? I suggest you create an MSN (which takes a total of 4 minutes, maybe less) and chat with him there, although he does have a spot for Skype in the application. Alright, moving on. I don’t even understand your application.

[quote=“iz help iz, post:20, topic:454713”]Name:lucas
Previous experience and works: 6 years
Skype/MSN: skype: lucas.havill2
Timezone:new zealnad
Time available to allocate per day towards the server: like 6-7 hours[/quote]
First of all, when it asks for previous experience and works, you simply tell him how long you’ve been working with Java, and show him your past work. Pretty simple, correct? Second of all, I didn’t know ‘New Zealand’ was a time-zone. Not to mention, you misspelled it.

On point. This is the only Delta that makes customs look good (That’s my opinion). I logged on awhile back to see what it’s like, and the whole server seems to be based off customs, such as the areas, npc’s, etc. With all of this being said, I wish you the best of luck, I hope you find who you’re looking for to continue the legacy of Project-Rainbow.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @supaz Supaz
item.description:
@supaz wrote:

Hello, I’m one of Whac’s buddies. (Logan)
I’ve asked him multiple times what’s been going on with the server. I am extremely excited to say that i’m glad its going somewhere.

Name: Logan G.
Previous experience and works: Project-Aerial, BanditPkz, Ruins 562, some more. Just letting you know, I actually know some Delta even though I love higher revisions.
Skype/MSN: LoganGar PM me on skype of you need my MSN.
Timezone: PST -8
Time available to allocate per day towards the server: loads, I work mornings, and not on weekends.

Any other questions feel free to contact me. You can verify I know justin. Just incase he has no idea this is my mopar acc.
I would love to be an addition to the development team, and it would be great to work with/under you Null.
Thanks, Logan G.

Read full topic

i seen a server like this before got like 75 players online most times good luck and hope this goes far
